title: Print Hello to Console
statement: print hello

title: Add Two Numbers
statement: Write a function that takes two integers and returns their sum.
expected: The output should be the sum of the two input integers.
difficulty_notes: Simple arithmetic with a fixed expected result

title: Check Even Number
statement: Write a one-line Python program that prints True if 6 is even

statement: Write a program that prints "Hello" to console.

statement: Given two numbers a and b, print their sum.

statement: Check if a given number n is even.

statement: Find the maximum element in a given integer array.

statement: Calculate the sum of all elements in an array.

statement: Implement binary search on a sorted array.

statement: Reverse a singly linked list.

statement: Check if a linked list has a cycle.

statement: Implement a queue using two stacks.

statement: Merge two sorted arrays into one sorted array.

statement: Print all prime numbers up to n.

statement: Compute factorial of a number n.

statement: Rotate an array by k positions to the right.

statement: Find the length of the longest increasing subsequence in an array.

statement: Check if a string of parentheses is balanced.

statement: Given an array and target, find indices of two numbers that add up to target.

statement: Print the elements of a matrix in spiral order.

statement: Compute GCD of two numbers.

statement: Return the index of the first non-repeating character in a string.

statement: Check if a number is a palindrome.
